# sage-image



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                   | Type                | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`     | `alt`     | The image's alt tag. If none is provided, it will default to an empty string. | `string`            | `''`        |
| `loading` | `loading` | Indicates how the browser should load the image. Defaults to "eager".         | `"eager" \| "lazy"` | `'eager'`   |
| `src`     | `src`     | The image's source.                                                           | `string`            | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------
